hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.
